loans.name: Marbelly Del Rosario

texts.es: Marbelly es una mujer luchadora de 33 años de edad, acompañada, con un hijo de 5 años, su negocio es una tapicería desde hace 10 años, su compañero hace el proceso del tapizado. El crédito lo solicita para comprar materiales para elaborar el tapizado de muebles como madera, tela, cuerina, hilo.
texts.en:
Marbelly,33, is a fighter. She is in a relationship and has a 5-year-old son. Marbelly has had an upholstery’s shop for ten years. Her partner is in charge of the upholstery process.

She is requesting a loan to buy materials for her business, such as wood, fabric, imitation leather and threads.

loans.use: to buy materials like wood, imitation leather, fabric and threads for her upholstery business.

loans.name: Jehova Es Mi Pastor Group

texts.es: El grupo lo conforman tres socias microempresarias una de ellas es Lissete mujer de 43 años de edad, acompañada, su negocio es la venta de frutas en el mercado de Masaya desde hace 10 años, su papa y ella atiende el negocio y a los clientes. Tiene 10 años de ser cliente de la institución, el crédito lo solicita para comprar tamarindo, naranja de fresco, calala, pitahaya. Justina mujer de 52 años de edad su negocio es la venta de frutas y Yamileth mujer de 36 años y su negocio es la venta de perecederos como tomate, chiltoma, cebolla, papa.
texts.en: The group has three microentrepreneur members. One of them is a woman named Lissete, who is 43 years old. She has been selling fruit in a market in Masaya for the last 10 years. She and her dad look after the business and customers.  She has been with the institution for 10 years. The loan she has requested is for the purchase of tamarind, fresh oranges, passion fruit, and dragon fruit.  A 52-year-old woman named Justina has a business which consists of the sale of fruits, and Yamileth, a 36-year-old woman, works selling perishable foods such as tomatoes, sweet peppers, onions, and potatoes.

loans.use: to purchase tamarind, fresh oranges, passion fruit, and dragon fruit.

loans.name: Los Jirones Group

texts.es: El grupo está conformado por tres socias emprendedoras una de ellas es Casimira mujer de 28 años de edad, acompañada, con cuatro hijos de 11, 9, 3 y 1 año, su negocio es la venta de recarga, venta de madera y agricultura desde hace 10 años, su marido le ayuda a comprar y vender la madera. El crédito lo requiere para la compra de frijoles por quintal en el norte para comercializarlos en Masaya. María mujer de 28 años de edad su negocio es una pulpería y Maribel mujer de 37 años su negocio es la venta de arroz de leche y buñuelos.
texts.en:
This group is made up of three women entrepreneurs, one of whom is Casimira, who is 28 years old, married, and has four children, ages 11, 9, 3 and 1. Her business for ten years now is selling pre-paid cell phone minutes and wood, and working in agriculture. Casimira says that her husband helps her to buy and sell the wood. 

Casimira is requesting this loan to buy beans in bulk in the north of the country, which she plans to sell in Masaya [a city south of Managua]. 

Maria is 28 years old and her business is a small grocery store. Maribel is 37 years old and her business is selling rice pudding and fritters.

loans.use: To buy beans in bulk to sell.

loans.name: Amor Del Campo Group

texts.es: Este grupo está formado por cuatro socios emprendedores uno de ellos es Silvia de 29 años de edad, soltera, con tres hijos bajo su cargo de 12, 4 y 2 años, su negocio es la venta de tamales pisques y dulce en el oriental desde hace 15 años. Es cliente de la institución desde hace 1 año, el crédito lo solicita para la compra de materia prima para la elaboración de los tamales como es cal, maíz, leña, dulces, azúcar. Ervin hombre de 40 años de edad su negocio es la venta de frutas, Blanca mujer de 28 años, se dedica al negocio de venta de verduras y Aura mujer de 48 años su negocio es la venta de tamales pisque, coyoles y pinolillo.
texts.en: This is group has four enterprising members. Silvia is 29 years old, single, and has three children aged 12, 4 and 2 in her charge. She has worked selling Pisque-style tamales and sweets in the market for 15 years. She has been part of the institution for a year. She needs the loan to buy raw materials for the preparation of tamales such as corn, sugar, lime, and firewood, as well as sweets. Ervin is 40 years old and his job is selling fruit. Blanca is 28 years old and works selling vegetables. Aura is 48 years old and she sells Pisque-style tamales, coyoles [fruit of the yagua palm] and pinolillo [a local cornmeal and cacao drink].

loans.use: buy raw materials for the preparation of tamales such as corn, sugar, lime and firewood, as well as sweets

loans.name: Luchando Siempre Group

texts.es: El grupo está formado por tres socias microempresarias una de ellas es Raquel de 33 años de edad, casada, con tres hijos de 16, 13 y 11 años. Su negocio es una pulpería ubicada en su domicilio, venta de yoltamales, atol agrio, atol dulce desde hace 10 años, sus productos los comercializa en el mercado de  Masaya. Es cliente de la institución desde hace 1 año, el crédito lo solicita para invertir en materia prima para la elaboración de los productos como maíz, leña,cal,dulce, etc. y comprar inventario para la pulpería como arroz, frijoles, azúcar, aceite, gaseosa. Violeta mujer de 30 años de edad su negocio es la venta de gaseosa, comida, fresco, repostería y Marbely mujer de 32 años su negocio es una peluquería.
texts.en:
The women in this group are micro-entrepreneurs.  Raquel, 33, is one of them.  She's married and has three children, ages 16, 13, and 11.  Her business is a grocery store in her home.  She sells yoltamales [corn tamales] and atole beverages in the market in Masaya.  She has been a client of the institution for a year.

Raquel's requesting the loan to invest in ingredients to make her products.  She'll buy corn, firewood, lime, sweets, etc., as well as inventory for the grocery store such as rice, beans, sugar, oil, and soda.

Violeta, 30, sells soda, food, soft drinks, and pastry.  Marbely, 32, has a beauty salon.

loans.use: to buy ingredients and groceries

loans.name: Rosada Group

texts.es: El grupo está formado por tres socias luchadoras una de ellas es Lucrecia mujer de 52 años de edad, casada, con un hijo de 20 años, su negocio es la venta de artesanía en un tramo del mercado de Masaya desde hace 20 años. Es cliente de la institución desde hace 3 años. El crédito lo solicita para comprar cuadros de pinturas, camisetas nacionales, cerámica y hacerle mejoras al negocio. María mujer de 45 años de edad se dedica al negocio de la venta de gaseosa y Rosa mujer de 30 años su negocio es la venta de huevo.
texts.en: This group has three hard-working members. One of them is Lucrecia, who is a 52-year-old married woman with a 20-year-old son. For the past 20 years, she has been selling crafts in the market of Masaya. She has also been a client of the institution for 3 years. She needs the loan to buy canvas, national shirts and ceramics, as well as to make improvements to her business. Maria is 45 years old and works selling soda, and Rosa is 30 years old and sells eggs.

loans.use: buy canvas, national shirts and ceramics, and to improve the structure of her business

loans.name: Ousmane

texts.fr:
Né en Décembre 1986 à Kolondièba  chef-lieu de la dite  commune, Ousmane   marié et père d’un enfant y réside avec  sa femme dans une famille nucléaire.
 Mr Ousmane s’est intéressé aux activités de boulanger il y a 7 ans.  Il est très sollicité en ville,  dans les villages et surtout les jours de foire. 
Fort de ses années d’expériences dans le domaine, il collabore avec Soro Yiriwaso pour augmenter  son fonds de commerce afin de satisfaire sa clientèle qui ne cesse de grandir et est à son  deuxième prêt, après avoir remboursé le prêt précédent. 
Ousmane compte utiliser son prêt pour acheter des sacs de  farine de blé. Il s’approvisionne chez les grossistes à Bamako et souvent à Kolondièba. Il effectue ses ventes de pain en détail au comptant  dans sa boulangerie et de façon ambulante à une clientèle  composée d’hommes et de femmes.
Ousmane espère réaliser un bénéfice mensuel de 85.000FCFA qui sera utilisé pour  subvenir aux besoins de la famille, rembourser le prêt et réinvestir dans son activité.
texts.en:
Born in December 1986 in Kolondièba, capital of the district by the same name, Ousmane is married, the father of one child and resides with his wife in a nuclear family.

Mr Ousmane became interested in baking activities seven years ago. He is very much in demand in the city, in villages and especially on market fair days.

With his years of experience in this field, he collaborates with Soro Yiriwaso to increase his working capital and satisfy his increasing number of customers. He is now on his second loan, having repaid the previous loan.

Ousmane will use his loan to buy bags of wheat flour. He buys from wholesalers in Bamako and often in Kolondièba. He retails his bread for cash, in his bakery and as an itinerant vendor, to a clientele composed of men and women.

Ousmane hopes to make a monthly profit of 85,000 CFA francs that will be used to support the family, repay the loan and be reinvested in his business.

loans.use: Purchase flour for bread making

loans.name: Los Robles Group

texts.es: El grupo lo forman cuatro mujeres emprendedoras una de ellas es Yeraldin mujer de 27 años de edad, soltera, su negocio es la venta de cereales en un tramo del mercado oriental de Managua desde hace 10 años, el crédito lo solicita para comprar por quintal maíz, cacao, canela, semilla de jícaro, pujagua. Gloria mujer de 39 años su negocio es la venta de especie, Epifania mujer de 52 años su negocio es la venta de artesanía de madera, y Ana tiene 38 años y su negocio es la venta de frutas y verduras.
texts.en: This group has four enterprising women as its members.  One is Yeraldin - she is 27 years old, single, and, for ten years, has had a business selling cereals on a stretch of Mangua's eastern market.  She is applying for a loan to buy corn by the hundredweight, and cacao, cinnamon, and calabash.  Thirty-nine-year-old Gloria has a business selling spices.  Epifania is 52 years old and sells wooden artisan products.  Ana is 38 years old and has a business selling fruits and vegetables.

loans.use: to buy corn by the hundredweight, and cacao, cinnamon, and calabash.

loans.name: Nueva Vida En Cristo Group

texts.es: El grupo lo forman tres socias luchadoras una  de ellas es Esther mujer de 35 años de edad, casada, con dos hijos de 10 y 1 año, su negocio es la venta de ropa nueva en la zona franca desde hace 3 años. Es cliente de la institución desde hace 1 año tiempo en el cual ha demostrado ser una persona muy responsable en los préstamos obtenidos. El crédito nuevamente lo solicita para la compra de uniformes escolares y posteriormente venderlos  en la zona y ropa normal como pantalones, camisetas, faldas, shores, blusas. Yamileth tiene 26 años de edad su negocio es la venta de ropa interior y Kathy tiene 19 años su negocio es la venta de zapatos.
texts.en: This group is made up of three feisty members, one of whom is 35-year-old Esther.  She is married and has two children, aged ten years and one year.  Esther has had a business selling new clothes in the free trade zone for three years.  She has been a member of the communal bank for one year and, during this time, she has shown herself to be very responsible with the loans.  Esther is now applying for a loan to buy school uniforms to sell on in the free trade zone, and to buy other clothes such as trousers, shirts, skirts, shorts, and blouses.  Yamileth is 26 years old and sells underwear.  Kathy is 19 years old and has a business selling shoes.

loans.use: to buy school uniforms, and other clothes such as trousers, shirts, skirts, shorts, and blouses.

loans.name: Josue 1.9 Group

texts.es: El grupo lo forman tres socios microempresarios uno de ellos es Freddy  tiene 38 años de edad, casado, con dos hijos de 22 y 17 años, su negocio es la venta de granos básicos en el mercado desde hace 17 años, su esposa y sus hijos le ayudan a atender a los clientes que llegan a comprar. El crédito lo solicita para comprar inventario como arroz, azúcar, aceite, jabón, papel higiénico, shampoo, pasta dental, etc. María tiene 36 años su negocio es la venta de refresco y calzado y Reyna tiene 43 años su negocio es la venta de granos básicos.
texts.en: This group is made up of three entrepreneurs, one of whom is 38-year-old Freddy.  He is married and has two children, aged 22 and 17 years old each.  For the last 17 years Freddy has had a business selling basic grains in the market.  His wife and children help him to serve customers who come to buy.  Freddy is applying for a loan in order to buy stock such as rice, sugar, oil, soap, toilet paper, shampoo, toothpaste, and more.  María is 36 years old and has a business selling soft drinks and footwear.  Reyna is 43 years old and her business is selling basic grains..

loans.use: to buy stock such as rice, sugar, oil, soap, toilet paper, shampoo, toothpaste, and more.

loans.name: La Estrella Y El Lucero Group

texts.es: Este grupo está formado  por tres socias una de ellas es Mariela tiene 24 años de edad, acompañada, con un hijo de 10 meses, su negocio es la venta de ropa usada ambulante desde hace 3 años, el crédito lo solicita para comprar por docena ropa usada como pantalones de varon, de damas, de niños,faldas, camisetas y cosméticos, Tania tiene 27 años su negocio es la venta de sopa y Erika tiene de 25 años su negocio es la venta de ropa usada y nueva.
texts.en: This group is made up of thre members. One of them is Mariela. She is 24, married, and has a 10 month old son. Her business has been selling used clothes as a street vendor for 3 years. She is asking for the loan to buy used clothes by the dozen, such as men's women's and children's pants, skirts, t-shirts and cosmetics. Tania is 27 years old. Her business is selling soup, and Erika is 25 and her business is selling new and used clothes.

loans.use: to buy used clothes by the dozen, such as men's and children's and women's pants,  skirts, t-shirts and cosmetics.

loans.name: Odelia Group

texts.es: El grupo lo conforman tres mujeres emprendedoras una de ellas es Yessenia tiene 32 años de edad, casada, con cuatro hijos de 12, 11, 9 y 6 años, su negocio es la venta de tortillas y ropa usada en su domicilio  desde hace 5 años, ella y sus hijos atienden los negocios es cliente de la institución desde hace 3 años, el crédito lo solicita para la compra de maíz, leña, cal y ropa usada por docena como pantalones de damas, de varon, de niños,blusas,camisetas,shores,etc. Aurora mujer de 42 años su negocio es la venta de fritanga y Luisa mujer de 26 años y su negocio es la venta de comida, fresco y gaseosa
texts.en: This group is comprised of three women entrepreneurs. One of them is Yessenia, who is 32 years old, married, and has four children aged 12, 11, 9, and 6. She has been selling tortillas and used clothing at her house for 5 years. Her children help her run her business. She has been a client of the field partner for 3 years and asks for a loan in order to buy sweetcorn, firewood, lime, and used clothing (trousers for ladies, men, and children, T-shirts, shorts, etc.) by the dozen. The other two members are Aurora, 42, who sells fried food, and Luisa, 26, who sells food, cold drinks and soft drinks.

loans.use: to buy what she needs to make tortillas and to buy used clothing to sell.

loans.name: Rosa Mistica Group

texts.es: El grupo está formado por tres socios microempresarios uno de ellos es Don Luis tiene 57 años de edad, acompañado, con dos hijos de 20 y 3 años, su negocio es la venta de prendas de oro desde hace 8 años, sus productos los comercializa en su comunidad y su esposa e hijo le ayudan a vender en las zonas francas. Tiene 7 años de ser cliente de la institución. El crédito lo está solicitando para la comprar de más prendas de oro. Jovana mujer de 37 años de edad su negocio es la venta de fritanga y Catalina mujer de 34 años su negocio es una pulpería.
texts.en: The group is comprised of three small entrepreneurs. One of them is Luis, 57, who lives with his spouse and has two children, aged 20 and 3. He has been selling gold jewellery for 8 years in his neighbourhood. Her spouse and his son help him sell his goods in free zones. He has been a client of the field partner for 7 years. He asks for a loan to buy more gold jewellery. The other two members of the group are Yovana, 37, who sells fried food, and Catalina, 34, who has a grocery shop.

loans.use: to buy more gold jewellery.

loans.name: Luchando Por La Vida Group

texts.es: El grupo lo forman tres socios microempresarios uno de ellos es Yara mujer de 21 años de edad, casada, su negocio es la venta de ropa nueva, zapatos y cosméticos desde hace 4 años, su hermana le ayuda a vender. Tiene de ser cliente de la institución desde año y medio, el crédito lo solicita para la compra de mercadería como pantalones, camisas, blusas, faldas, shores, vestidos, zapatos de diferentes estilos y cosméticos como perfumes, sombras, pinturas. María mujer de 50 años de edad su negocio es la venta de tortillas y costura y Cándido hombre de 49 años su negocio es la venta de fritanga y fresco.
texts.en: This group is comprised of three small entrepreneurs. One of them is Yara, who is 21 years old and married. She has been selling new clothing, shoes, and cosmetics for 4 years with the help of her brother. She has been a client of the field partner for one year and a half. She asks for a loan to buy merchandise to sell, such as trousers, shirts, blouses, skirts, shorts, dresses, various types of shoes, and cosmetics (mainly perfume, eyeshadow and makeup). The other two members of the group are María, 50, who sells tortillas and is a seamstress, and Cándido, 49, who sells fried food and cold drinks.

loans.use: to buy clothes and cosmetics to sell.

loans.name: Madrigales Norte Group

texts.es: Este grupo está formado por tres mujeres emprendedoras una de ellas es Andrea tiene 53 años de edad, acompañada, su negocio es la venta de carne de res, nacatamales, y fritanga desde hace 5 años, el crédito lo está solicitando para la compra por quintal de carne de res, carne de cerdo, hojas, mecates, leña, maíz, plátano, queso, carbón, repollo, tortillas. Maryuri tiene 25 años de edad su negocio es la venta de nacatamales y María tiene 48 años se dedica al negocio de la venta de carne de cerdo.
texts.en: This group is comprised of three women entrepreneurs. One of them is Andrea, 53 and married, who has been selling meat, natacamales, and fried food for five years. She asks for a loan to buy beef, pork, palm leaves, string, firewood, sweetcorn, plantain, cheese, coal, cabbage, and tortillas. The other two members of the group are Maryuri, 25, who also sells natacamales, and María, 48, who sells pork.

loans.use: to buy quintals of meat and other ingredients to make food to sell.

loans.name: Las Artesanas Group

texts.es: El grupo lo conforman tres exitosas mujeres una de ellas Marcela tiene 22 años, acompañada, con un hijo de 4 años, su negocio es la venta de artesanía de tuza y cosméticos por catálogos de la Zermat desde hace 6 años, el crédito lo solicita para comprar al contado cosméticos como perfumes, sombras, boddy y una vitrina. Marleni tiene  32 años de edad su negocio es una mini pulpería y Sobenia joven de 22 años su negocio es venta de ropa nueva.
texts.en: This group is made up of three successful women, one of whom is Marcela.  She is 22, has a common-law spouse and one 4-year-old child.  She has been selling corn husk handicrafts and Zermat catalog cosmetics for six years.  She is seeking a loan to buy cosmetics, including perfumes, eye shadows, skin care products, and a display case in cash.  Marleni is 32 and has a mini grocery.  Sobenia is a young woman of 22 and sells new clothing

loans.use: to buy cosmetics, including perfumes, eye shadows, skin care products, and a display case in cash.

loans.name: Colinas Del Exito Group

texts.es: El grupo lo conforman tres socias microempresarias una de ellas es Ana mujer emprendedora de 29 años de edad, acompañada, con dos hijos de 9 y 8 años, su negocio es una pulpería ubicada en su domicilio desde hace 5 años su mama y ella atienden el negocio. El crédito lo requiere para la compra de granos básicos como arroz, aceite, gaseosas, productos lácteos, carne de res, carne de pollo, etc. Kenia joven de 21 años de edad su negocio es la venta de ropa nueva y Karen mujer de 28 años de edad su negocio es una pulpería.
texts.en: This group is made up of three enterprising members.  One member is Ana.  She is 29 years old and has a partner and two children, aged nine and eight years old each.  Ana's business is a grocery store that she runs out of her home.  She has had this business for five years and both she and her mother tend to the shop.  Ana needs a loan to buy basic goods, such as rice, oil, fizzy drinks, dairy products, red meat, chicken, and more.  Kenia is 21 years old and has a business selling new clothes.  Karen is 28 years old and she also has a grocery store.

loans.use: to buy basic goods, such as rice, oil, fizzy drinks, dairy products, red meat, chicken, and more.

loans.name: El Museo Group

texts.es: El grupo está conformado por tres socias emprendedoras una de ellas es Ileana mujer de 34 años de edad, acompañada, con tres hijos de 18, 9 y 3 años, su negocio es una pulpería y compra y venta de chatarras desde hace 7 años, su hija y su esposo atiende la pulpería. Tiene 4 años de ser cliente de la institución, el crédito lo requiere para la compra de granos básicos como arroz, azúcar, aceite, gaseosa, jabón, papel higiénico, carne de pollo, productos lácteos, etc. Flor mujer de 58 años de edad su negocio es la venta de tortillas y cosméticos de Avon y Mariela mujer de 32 años de edad su negocio es la venta de cosméticos y prendas de plata.
texts.en:
This group is comprised of three enterprising members. One of them is Ileana, a 34-year-old woman who is married and has three children (ages 18, 9, and 3). She runs a grocery store and has been buying and selling scrap metal for seven years. Her daughter and her husband look after the grocery store. Ileana has been a member of the communal bank for four years. She needs this loan to buy staple grains such as rice, sugar, oil, soda, soap, toilet paper, chicken meat, dairy products, etc. 

Flor is a 58-year-old woman who has a business selling tortillas and Avon products. Mariela is a 38-year-old woman who sells cosmetics and scrap metal.

loans.use: to buy staple grains such as rice, sugar, oil, soda, soap, toilet paper, chicken meat, dairy products, etc.

loans.name: Eduardito Group

texts.es: El grupo está conformado por tres socias microempresarias de éxitos una de ellas es Fátima mujer de 49 años de edad, casada, con dos hijos adultos, su negocio es servicio de taxi desde hace 6 años. Le paga a un cadete, es cliente de la institución desde hace 8 años. El crédito lo solicita para la inversión de cambio de llantas, cambio de aceite, etc. Xiomara mujer de 48 años de edad su negocio es vender productos Avon, Arabela y vender en un kiosco estudiantil Y Xiomara Antonia mujer de 30 años se dedica a la venta de electrodoméstico y prendas de plata.
texts.en:
This group is made up of three successful micro-enterprise partners. One of them is Fátima. She is 49 years old and is married with 2 grown children. Her business is a taxi service which she has had for 6 years. She employs a driver. She has been a client of this financial institution for 8 years. She is requesting the loan to invest in changing tyres and oil etc.

Xiomara is a 48 year old woman who sells Avon and Arabela products in a student kiosk. Xiomara Antonio is a 30 year old woman who sells electro-domestic products and silver jewelry.

loans.use: El crédito lo solicita para la inversión de cambio de llantas, cambio de aceite, etc.

loans.name: Dios Nos Ayude Group

texts.es: El grupo lo conforman tres socias emprendedoras una de ellas es Josefa una mujer de 46 años de edad, se dedica al comercio de vender ropa, soltera con un hijo de 11 años, lleva 20 años de dedicarse al negocio, es cliente de la institución desde hace 1 año. El crédito lo solicita para comprar ropa nueva de niños, pantalones, mamelucos, pijamas, trajecitos de niños, etc. Raquel mujer de 30 años de edad, se dedica a la venta de zapatos y Marvelly mujer de 35 años su negocio es la venta de ropa y zapatos.
texts.en:
The group is formed by three enterprising women. One of them is Josefa, a 46 year old single woman with an 11-year-old son. She has a business selling clothing which she has run for 20 years. She has been a client of the institution for 1 year. She is seeking a loan to buy new children's clothing, pants, sleepwear, pyjamas, children's outfits, etc. 

Raquel, 30, works selling shoes and Marvelly, 35, sells clothing and shoes.

loans.use: to buy new children's clothing, pants, sleepwear, pyjamas, children's outfits, etc.

loans.name: Ana Elizabeth Group

texts.es: Este grupo lo conforman tres mujeres emprendedoras y luchadoras una de ellas es Yamileth con 40 años de edad, casada, con dos hijos de 6 y 2 años, su negocio es la venta de comida, fritanga y sopa desde hace año y medio, su tía y ella atienden el negocio, es cliente de la institución desde hace año y medio. El crédito lo invertirá en la compra de verduras, carne de res, carne de cerdo, carne de pollo, hueso de res, condimentos, gaseosas variadas. Silvania joven de 23 años de edad su negocio es la venta de bisutería y María mujer de 34 años de edad y su negocio es la venta de ropa nueva.
texts.en:
This group consists of three enterprising, tenacious women.  One of them is Yamileth, 40, whose married with two children who are 6 and 2 years old.  Her business for the last year and a half has been selling food, fried snacks and soup.  She will use the loan to buy vegetables, beef, pork, chicken, beef bones, condiments and assorted soft-drinks.

Silvania, 23, has a costume jewelry selling business and María, 34, sells new clothing.

loans.use: to buy ingredients and supplies.

loans.name: Fe, Amor Y Esperanza Group

texts.es: El grupo está formado por tres socios inversionista microempresarios uno de ellos es Oscar tiene 25 años de edad, soltero, su negocio es una pulpería ubicada en su domicilio desde hace 2 años, anteriormente se dedicaba a estudiar. El crédito lo está solicitando para la compra de un frezzer de 500 libras, granos básicos como arroz, azúcar, aceite, frijoles, jabón de lavar, productos lácteos, etc. Sergio tiene 35 años su negocio es la venta de hojas de chagüites y Mercedes tiene 46 años y su negocio es la venta de leña.
texts.en:
This group is composed of three members who are investors and entrepreneurs. One of them is Oscar, 25, who is single and has had a grocery store at home for two years. Before he opened it, he was a student.

Oscar is requesting a loan to buy a freezer with a capacity of 500 lb., grains such as rice, sugar, oil, beans, soap, dairy products, etc.

The remaining members are Sergio, 35, who sells chagüite leaves [banana tree leaves, commonly used to cook or wrap food] and Mercedes, 46, who sells firewood.

loans.use: to buy a freezer and supplies such as rice, sugar, oil, beans, soap and dairy products.

loans.name: La Ceibita Group

texts.es: El grupo lo conforman tres socias microempresarias una de ellas es Aura mujer de 40 años de edad, acompañada, su negocio es la  compra y venta de cosechas desde hace 10 años, sus hijos le ayudan a cortar las cosechas y posteriormente aliñarlas para venderlas. Tiene 4 años de ser cliente de la institución, El crédito lo requiere para la compra de más cosechas. María mujer de 33 años de edad su negocio es una pulpería y Trinidad mujer de 56 años de edad su negocio es compra y venta de cosecha.
texts.en:
This group is composed of three members, all of them micro entrepreneurs. One of them is Aura, 40, who is in a relationship. She has been buying and selling different agricultural products for ten years. Her children help her to collect the harvest and prepare them for sale. She has been a client of the institution for four years and is requesting a loan to buy more agricultural products.

The remaining members are María, 33, who owns a grocery store and Trinidad, 56, who buys and sells different types of crops.

loans.use: to buy more agricultural products, such as mamon, plums, avocado and tamarind.

loans.name: Soberana Group

texts.es: El grupo está formado por tres socias exitosa una de ellas es María mujer de 37 años de edad, soltera, con tres hijos de 15, 13 y 7 años, su negocio es la venta de fritanga en su domicilio desde hace 10 años. Tiene de ser cliente de la institución 6 años, el crédito lo está solicitando para comprar materia prima para la elaboración de la fritanga como es plátanos, arroz, queso, frijoles, aceite, carbón, repollo, tortillas, carne de res, carne de cerdo, carne de pollo, etc. Audelina mujer de 36 años de edad su negocio es un taller de zapatería y Josefa mujer de 36 años su negocio es la venta de fresco y comida.
texts.en:
The group is made up of three successful members.  One of them is María, 37.  She's single and has three children, ages 15, 13, and 7.  She has been selling fried snacks for ten years and has been a client of the institution for six.

María's requesting the loan to buy ingredients to make her snacks, such as plantains, rice, cheese, beans, oil, charcoal, cabbage, tortillas, beef, pork, chicken, etc.

Audelina, 36, has a shoe store and Josefa, 36, sells food and beverages.

loans.use: to buy ingredients

loans.name: De Sol A Sol Group

texts.es: El grupo lo forman tres socios emprendedores uno de ellos es María mujer de 47 años de edad, soltera, su negocio es la venta de ropa nueva desde hace 7 años, sus hijas ya mayores e independientes le ayudan a vender ropa,tiene 7 años de ser cliente de la institucion. El crédito lo requiere para comprar por docenas pantalones de damas, blusas de diferentes estilos, trajes de niños, Rosa joven de 23 años su negocio es la venta de ropa nueva y Hugo tiene 27 años y su negocio es la venta de ropa nueva.
texts.en:
The group is made up of three enterprising members.  One of them is María, 47.  She's single and has sold new clothing for seven years.  Her daughters, who are older and on their own, help her.  She has been a client of the institution for seven years.

María needs the loan to buy dozens of pairs of women's pants, different styles of blouses, and children's outfits.

Rosa, 23, and Hugo, 27, both sell new clothing.

loans.use: to buy pants, blouses, and children's outfits

loans.name: El  Aguacatillo Group

texts.es: El grupo lo conforman tres socios emprendedores uno de ellos es María Demesia una mujer luchadora de 42 años de edad, divorciada, con dos hijos que dependen de ella de 21 y 17 años. Su negocio es la elaboración y venta de almohada, venta de frutas y verduras ambulante desde hace 12 años, sus hijos le ayudan a vender, tiene de ser cliente de la institución 3 años, el crédito lo está solicitando para comprar materia prima como gatillo, esponja y algodón. Ana mujer de 53 años su negocio es la venta de pinol y pinolillo, Danny  tiene 26 años y su negocio es trabajador de una empresa.
texts.en:
This group consists of three enterprising members.  One of them is María Demesia, a determined woman who is 42 years old, divorced, and has two children (ages 21 and 17) who are dependent on her.  Her business involves making and selling pillows.  She has also been selling fruits and vegetables as a street vendor for 12 years.  Her children help with selling.  María has been a client of ADIM for three years.  The loan she is requesting will be used to buy supplies such as a hot glue gun, sponges, and cotton.  

Ana is a 53-year-old woman who has a business of selling “pinol” and “pinolillo” (traditional Nicaraguan beverages made from corn and cacao).  Danny is 26 years old and is employed at a company.

loans.use: to buy a hot glue gun, sponges, and cotton for making pillows.

loans.name: Aventura Group

texts.es: El grupo está formado por tres socias emprendedoras una de ellas es Yaneris joven de 24 años de edad, soltera, con un hijo de 7 años, su negocio es la elaboración y venta de bisutería desde hace 4 años, su mama y ella vende sus productos en su comunidad . El crédito lo requiere para comprar materiales como piedras, cadenas, clavitos, argollas para la elaboracion de collares, pulseras, chapas. Scarleth mujer de 32 años su negocio es una pulpería y Maylin mujer de 27 años su negocio es la elaboración y venta de zapatos.
texts.en:
This group consists of three enterprising members.  Yaneris, 24, is one of them.  She’s single with a 7-year-old son.  Her business for the last four years has been making and selling costume jewelry.  She and her mother sell the items in her community.  She needs the loan to buy supplies like stones, chains, little nails and hoops to make necklaces, bracelets and pins.

Scarleth is 32-years-old and her business is a grocery store and Maylin is 27-years-old and her business is making and selling shoes.

loans.use: to buy jewelry-making supplies.

loans.name: El Futuro Group

texts.es: Grupo formado por cuatro mujeres emprendedoras una de ellas es Marta Elena tiene 53 años de edad, casada, con dos hijos de 18 y 15 años,Antes solo se dedicaba a la venta de cosmeticos de avon ahora su negocio es una estética de belleza y venta de cosméticos a domicilio desde hace 38 años. Tiene de ser cliente de la institución 9 años, el crédito lo solicita para la compra de cosméticos variados al contado y productos como tintes, keratina, shampoo especializado para el cuidado del cabello, uñas acrílicas. Ruth mujer de 36 años de edad su negocio es la venta de sopa, nacatamales y una pulpería ubicada en su domicilio, Celia mujer de 53 años de edad su negocio es el destace de cerdo en pie y Martha Salvadora tiene 46 años su negocio es la venta de sopa, fritanga y tortillas.
texts.en:
This group consists of four enterprising women.  Marta Elena, 53, is married with two children aged 18 and 15.  She used to just work selling Avon cosmetics but now for the last 38 years her business has been a beauty salon and selling cosmetics house to house.  She’s been a client of the institution for nine years and is asking for the loan to pay cash to buy assorted beauty products like hair dye, Keratina [hair-care product], special hair-care shampoo, acrylic fingernails, etc.

Ruth, 36, sells soup, nacatamales [Nicaraguan-style tamales] and has a home-based grocery store; Celia, 53, butchers pigs and Martha Salvadora, 46, sells soup, fried fast-food and tortillas.

loans.use: to buy beauty supplies.

loans.name: Misericordia Del Señor Group

texts.es: El grupo lo conforman tres socias microempresarias una de ellas es Gloria tiene 44 años de edad, acompañada, con un hijo de 17 años, su negocio es la venta de ropa usada en la zona franca desde hace 8 años su hijo le ayuda a vender, tiene de ser cliente de la institución 8 años tiempo en el cual ha demostrado ser una persona muy responsable, el crédito lo solicita para comprar ropa escogida por docena. Karla mujer de 32 años su negocio es la venta de ropa nueva y usada y Ruth tiene 44 años y su negocio es la venta de recarga y cosa de horno.
texts.en:
This is a group of three micro businesswomen.  One of them is Gloria, 44.  She has a spouse and a 17-years-old son.  Her business for the last 8 years has been used-clothes sales in the tax-free zone.  Her son helps her sell.  She’s been a client of the institution for 8 years and has shown herself to be a very responsible person throughout all this time.  She’s asking for a loan to buy selected clothing by the dozen.

Karla, 32, sells new and used clothes and Ruth, 44, sell mobile phone airtime cards and baking supplies.

loans.use: to buy select clothes by the dozen.

loans.name: El Rey De Gloria Group

texts.es: El grupo lo forman cuatro socias microempresarias una de ellas es Yadira mujer emprendedora de 60 años de edad, soltera, con un hijo de 22 años, su negocio es elaboración de costura y una pulpería desde hace 15 años, el crédito lo solicita para comprar tela y granos básicos como arroz, frijoles, azúcar, aceite, jabón, etc. Aura tiene 48 años de edad su negocio es la compra y venta de frutas, Sonia joven de 18 años su negocio es la venta de tortillas y chicha, María tiene 24 años su negocio es el destace de cerdo en pie.
texts.en:
This group consists of four members. Yadira is one of them. She is an enterprising single, 60 year old woman. She has a 22 year old son. For the past 15 years she has made clothing and has had a small store. She is requesting this loan to buy cloth to make clothes and basic grains for her store such as rice, beans, sugar, oil, soap, etc.

Aura is 48 years old and she buys and sells fruit. Sonia is a young woman of 18. She sells tortillas and chicha (a local liquor). Maria is 24 years old and her business is butchering pigs.

loans.use: to buy cloth to make clothes and basic grains for her store such as rice, beans, sugar, oil, soap, etc.

loans.name: El Manantial Group

texts.es: El grupo lo forman tres socias emprendedoras una de ellas es Damaris tiene 33 años de edad, acompañada, con tres hijos de 14, 13 y  10 años, su negocio es la venta de derivados del cerdo en su domicilio y sus alrededores desde hace 6 años. Sus hijos le ayudan a vender, el crédito lo solicita para la compra de carne de cerdo al por mayor para elaborar nacatamales, fritos, pepena y cabeza de chancho. Lorlin mujer de 34 años su negocio es una pulpería ubicada en su domicilio y Mirian mujer de 55 años su negocio es la venta de cosméticos de Avon.
texts.en: This communal bank is made up of 3 enterprising women.  One of these is Damaris, who is 33 years old and lives with a partner with whom she has 3 children aged 14, 13 and 10.  She's had a business selling pork dishes from her home and in the nearby areas for 6 years.  Her children help her with her sales.  She is requesting a loan to buy pork meat at wholesale to make nacatamales (a large tamale dish), fried food, tripe, and a dish made of pig head.  The other members of the group are Lorlin, a 34 year-old woman who has a grocery store in her home, and Mirian, a 55 year-old woman who has a business selling Avon cosmetics.

loans.use: to buy pork meat at wholesale

loans.name: Las Tres Rosas Group

texts.es: Grupo formado por tres socias microempresarias y luchadoras una de ellas es Elvira tiene 51 años, acompañada, su negocio es la venta de variedades de chiverías y tiene un kiosco en el parque  desde hace 10 años, tiene de ser cliente de la institución 9 años, el crédito lo solicita para surtir más el negocio y comprar meneítos, caramelos, gaseosas, agua, jugos, galletas, etc. Victoria tiene 59 años su negocio es una pulpería y Dominga tiene 66 años su negocio es la venta de pinol, pinolillo, tamales, güirilas.
texts.en: This group is formed of three determined microentrepreneurs. One of these women is Elvira, 51, who for 10 years has run a kiosk in the park selling a variety of snacks. She has worked with the institution for 9 years and is asking for a loan to supply her business and buy crisps, sweets, fizzy drinks, water, juice, biscuits etc. The other members are Victoria, 59, who runs a convenience store, and Dominga, 66, who sells traditional drinks and snacks.

loans.use: to supply her business by buying crisps, sweets, fizzy drinks, water, juice, biscuits etc.

loans.name: Inlimite Group

texts.es: El grupo está formado por cinco socios emprendedores uno de ellos es Rebeca mujer de 28 años de edad, casada, con dos hijos menores de 8 y 4 años, su negocio es la venta de ropa nueva y sandalias de diferentes estilos desde hace 10 años. Tiene de ser cliente de la institución año y medio, el crédito lo solicita para comprar camisas, pantalones, sandalias nacionales y extranjera. Ieana mujer de 42 años de edad su negocio es la venta de ropa usada, Fanny mujer de 43 años de edad su negocio es la venta de y distribución de cosméticos, Roberto hombre de 24 años de edad  tiene varias caponeras que da a trabajar y vende repuesto para computadoras, Ana mujer de 53 años su negocio es la venta de cosméticos.
texts.en:
This group is composed of five members, one of which is Rebeca. She is 28 years old, married and has two young children 8 and 4 years old. She sells new clothes and different styles of sandals. She has done this for ten years. She has belonged to ADIM for a year and a half. Rebeca is requesting this loan to buy shirts and trousers and national and imported sandals.

Ieana is 42 years old and she sells used clothing. Fanny is 43 years old and she sells and distributes cosmetics. Robert is 24 years old and he has some chicken coops he rents out. He also sells computer parts. Ana is 53 years old and sells cosmetics.

loans.use: to buy shirts and trousers and national and imported sandals.

loans.name: O. Maria Group

texts.es: Este grupo lo forman cuatro socios  emprendedores uno de ellos es Reyna tiene 40 años de edad, casada, con dos hijos menores de 16 y 12 años, su negocio es la venta de variedades como fresco, gaseosa, helado, hielo  en su domicilio desde hace 8 años, el crédito lo solicita para la compra de materia prima como frutas de melón, papaya, banano, naranja, mamon, nancite, cajillas de gaseosas de diferentes sabores. Liliam tiene 53 años de edad su negocio es la venta de leña, gaseosa y ropa  nueva, Olga tiene 50 años su negocio es una librería y venta de recarga, gaseosa, ropa, zapatos, Pedro tiene 60 años y su negocio es la venta de nacatamales, gaseosa, comida y sopa.
texts.en:
This group is formed by four entrepreneurial members. One of them is Reyna, who is 40 years old and married with two young daughters, ages 16 and 12. She has had a business in her home for the last eight years, selling various items such as fruit drinks, soft drinks, frozen treats and ice. She is requesting the loan to buy raw material like melons, papayas, bananas, oranges, Spanish limes, nances and boxes of soft drinks of various flavors. 

Liliam is 53 years old and her business is the sale of firewood, soft drinks and new clothing. Olga is 50 years old and her business is a bookstore and the sale of phone credit, soft drinks, clothing and shoes. Pedro is 60 years old and his business is the sale of tamales, soft drinks, food and soup.

loans.use: to buy raw material like melons, papayas, bananas, oranges, Spanish limes, nances and boxes of soft drinks of various flavors.

loans.name: La Confianza En Dios Group

texts.es: Grupo formado por tres socios microempresarios exitosos uno de ellos es Leonardo de 53 años de edad, casado, su negocio es la venta de repuesto de motos desde hace 6 años. Tiene de ser cliente de la institución 1 año. El crédito lo solicita para comprar inventario de repuesto como focos, baterías, parrillas, monturas, barras. Guillermina tiene 46 años de edad su negocio es la venta de tortillas y ropa nueva, Margarita tiene 31 años su negocio es una pulpería ubicada en su domicilio.
texts.en:
This is a group of three successful micro entrepreneurs.  Leonardo, 53, is one of them.  He’s married and his business for the last six years has been selling motorcycle spare parts.  He’s been a client of the institution for a year.  He’s asking for a loan to buy stock merchandise like bulbs, batteries, grills, braces, bars, etc.

Guillermina, 46, sells tortillas and new clothes and Margarita has had a home-based grocery store for 31 years.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise.

loans.name: Dulce Amistad Group

texts.es: Grupo formado por tres mujeres emprendedoras una de ellas es  Manuela de 24 años de edad, casada, con un hijo de dos meses, su negocio es la venta de fritanga todos los días ambulantes desde hace 6 años, su suegra y su cuñada le ayudan económicamente. El crédito lo solicita para la compra de ropa como uniformes y útiles escolares y materia prima para la elaboracion de sopa como  hueso de res chayote, ayote, yuca, repollo, culantro, naranja agria, etc. Sulma mujer de 24 años de edad su negocio es la venta de verduras y los fines de semana vende fritanga en su domicilio y Erika mujer de 32 años se dedica al negocio de la venta de verduras en el mercado oriental.
texts.en:
This group consists of three enterprising women.  Manuela, 24, is one of them. She’s married with a two-month-old son.  Her business for the last six years has been selling fast-food every day from place to place.  Her mother-in-law and her sister-in-law help her economically.  She’s asking for the loan to buy clothes likes school uniforms, school supplies and raw materials to make soup like beef bones, pumpkin, cassava, cabbage, coriander, sour oranges, etc.

Sulma, 24, sells vegetables and on weekends sells fast-food at home and Erika, 32, sells vegetables in the oriental market.

loans.use: to buy clothes, school supplies and soup-making ingredients.

loans.name: Gustavo Harol

texts.es: Gustavo es un hombre emprendedor de 54 años de edad, acompañado, con un hijo menor de 3 años, su negocio es una pulpería en su domicilio, además se dedica a la  crianza de cerdo, crianza de pollo,  destace de cerdo, destace de res, desde hace 5 años, su compañera se encarga de atender la pulpería y el del resto de los negocios, el crédito lo requiere para surtir más su pulpería y comprar granos básicos al por mayor como arroz, frijoles, azúcar, aceite, jabón, aces, cloros, chiverías, productos lácteos, cigarros, papel higiénico, jabón de olor, gaseosas.
texts.en: Gustavo is an enterprising, 54-year-old man.  He has a spouse and a 3-year-old son.  His business for the last five years has been a home-based grocery store and he also raises pigs and chickens and butchers pigs and beef.  His spouse manages the grocery store and he the other businesses.  He needs the loan to better stock the grocery store and to buy basic grains like rice, beans, sugar, oil, soap, Ace [detergent], chlorine bleach, snacks, dairy products, cigarettes, toilet paper, scented soap and soft-drinks at wholesale.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for his store.

loans.name: Omar Moises

texts.es: Omar es un hombre emprendedor de 31 años de edad, casado, con dos hijos de 7 años y 10 meses, su negocio es una pulpería, venta de cosméticos por catálogos y generales desde hace 3 años,  su esposa atiende la pulpería  y una persona particular le vende los cosméticos, tiene 1 año de ser cliente de la institución, el crédito lo requiere para comprar inventario de cosméticos al contado como perfumes, lociones, maquillajes, shampoo, desodorantes, cremas. Y granos básicos para la pulpería como arroz, frijoles, azúcar, aceite, gaseosas, jugos,  etc.
texts.en: Omar, 31, is an enterprising, married man with two children who are 7 years and 10 months old.  His business for the last three years has been a grocery store and selling cosmetics in general via catalog.  His wife manages the grocery store and another person in particular sells the cosmetics.  He’s been a client of the institution for a year and needs the loan to pay cash for stock cosmetics like perfume, lotion, makeup, shampoo, deodorant and creams and to buy basic grains like rice, beans, sugar, oil, soft-drinks, juice, etc. for the grocery store.

loans.use: to pay cash for cosmetics and to buy stock merchandise for the grocery store.

loans.name: Teresa De Jesús

texts.es: Teresa es una mujer de 39 años de edad, acompañada, con dos hijos de 18 y 15 años, su negocio es un salón de belleza desde hace 18 años, tiene una trabajadora particular que le ayuda a atender a los clientes, tiene 5 años de ser cliente de la institución. El crédito lo requiere para la compra de productos de belleza como keratina, tintes, uñas acrílicas, vitaminas, maquillaje profesional, etc.
texts.en: Teresa, 39, has a spouse and two children who are 18 and 15 years old.  Her business for the last 18 years has been a beauty salon.  She has an employee that helps her tend to customers.  She’s been a client of the institution for five years.  She needs the loan to buy beauty products like Keratina [hair-care product], dye, acrylic fingernails, vitamins, professional make-up, etc.

loans.use: to buy beauty products.

loans.name: Henry Antonio

texts.es: Henry hombre emprendedor de 49 años de edad, casado, con un hijo de 8 años, su negocio es la venta de productos lácteos desde hace 6 años, el crédito lo solicita para comprar más inventario como queso, crema, leche, huevo, etc.
texts.en: Henry is a 49 year old man, married, with an 8 year old son. His business is selling dairy products, which he has been doing for 6 years. He seeks a loan to buy more inventory such as cheese, cream, milk, eggs, etc.

loans.use: to buy inventory such as cheese, cream, milk, eggs, etc.

loans.name: Renacer Group

texts.es: Este grupo lo forman tres mujeres emprendedoras exitosas una de ellas es Heymi tiene 26 años de edad, soltera, su negocio es  la venta de ropa ambulante desde hace 6 años tiempo en el cual ha demostrado ser una persona responsable en sus pagos. El crédito lo solicita para la compra de camisas de vestir por docenas, trajes de niñas, shampoo. Jessica mujer de 29 años de edad su negocio es la venta de cosméticos y Orquídea mujer de 28 años su negocio es la venta de ropa usada.
texts.en: This group consists of three enterprising successful women. One of them is Heymi, 26 years old, single, and her business is selling clothing as a street vendor. She has had this business for 6 years during which time she has demonstrated to be a very responsible person with her payments. The loan will be used to buy shirts wholesale, children's outfits, shampoo. Jessica is 29 years old, her business is selling cosmetics. Orquídea is 28 years old, and her business is selling used clothing.

loans.use: to buy shirts wholesale, children's outfits, shampoo.

loans.name: Dios Con Nosotros Group

texts.es: El grupo lo forman tres socias microempresarias una de ellas es Mirna mujer de 59 años de edad, casada, su negocio antes era solo la venta ropa, ahora se dedica a vender variedades como frutas, gaseosas, y tambien ropa ambulante desde hace 17 años, tiene de ser cliente de la institución 7 años, el crédito lo está solicitando para la compra de inventario como cajillas de gaseosa, mango, naranja, papaya, y ropa. Gloria del Socorro mujer de 62  años su negocio es la venta de nacatamales y Gloria María tiene 53 años y su negocio es la venta de ropa usada.
texts.en:
This group is composed of three entrepreneurs. One of them is Mirna, a 59 year old, married woman. Her business was only selling used clothing, but now she sells more variety, like fruit and soft drinks, besides selling clothing door to door, which she has been doing for 17 years. She has belonged to ADIM for 7 years.

Mirna is requesting this loan to buy inventory such as soft drinks, mango, oranges, papaya and clothing. 

Gloria del Socorro is 62 years old and sells nacatamales (a local food). Gloria María is 53 years old and she sells used clothing.

loans.use: to buy inventory such as cases of soft drinks, mango, oranges, papaya and clothing.

loans.name: Matagalpa Group

texts.es: Este grupo lo conforman tres socias emprendedoras una de ellas es Silvia mujer luchadora de 39 años de edad, casada, su negocio es la venta de ropa usada ambulante desde hace 3 años. El crédito lo solicita para la compra de inventario de ropa usada como blusas, pantalones, faldas, pantalones de varón, Luz mujer de 34 años de edad se dedica la negocio de vender ropa y Sinthya joven de 22 años su negocio es la venta de ropa.
texts.en: This group comprises three enterprising members. One of them is Silvia, a driven woman who is 39 years old and married. She works as a street vendor selling used clothing like blouses, pants, skirts, and men's trousers. Luz, who is 34 years old, works selling clothing, and young Sinthya, who is 22, also sells clothing.

loans.use: to stock up on used clothing like blouses, pants, skirts, and men's trousers.

loans.name: Nisolat

texts.ru: Нисолат с детства любила животных и большую часть времени проводила с ними. Когда вышла замуж, у ее мужа имелся скотный двор, где она помогала ему с работой. Вот уже 15 лет как Нисолат вместе с мужем занимается животноводством. В данный момент Нисолат 50 лет, имеет сына и дочку и проживает со своей семьей в районе Зафаробод. Дочка Нисолат вышла замуж, а ее сын живет с ней и помогает родителям ухаживать за скотами. Она берет кредит, чтобы купить бычков и разводить их. Она надеется, что кредит поможет ей, и она купив бычков, увеличит поголовье скота.
texts.en: Nisolat has loved animals since she was a child, and has spent the greater part of her life with them.  When she first married her husband, he had a cattle pen where she would help him work.  Together, Nisolat and her husband have been raising livestock for the past 15 years.  She is 50 years old, has a son and daughter, and lives with her family in the Zafarobod region of Tajikistan.  Nisolat's daughter is married, whereas her son lives with her and helps his parents tend to their cattle.  She is seeking a loan to buy bull calves and raise them.  She hopes the loan will help her; that after buying the calves, she will be able to further increase her cattle.

loans.use: buy bull calves to expand her business

loans.name: Leidis

texts.es: Leidis, de 36 años, está casada con Juan y tiene 02 hijos de 11 años y un mes de nacido con quien vive en su casa propia. Leidis se dedica a la venta de comida todos los fines de semana se encarga de salir a la vereda de su casa, pintar una pizarra para ofrecer sus productos y empezar con los preparativos, toda esta actividad lo realiza sola. Le gusta mucho su trabajo, pues esta en contacto con las personas, se divierte, se relaja y sobre todo genera ingresos a su economía y así puede dar lo necesario a sus menores hijos, también lleva pedidos a domicilio y siempre tiene clientes que le solicitan sus deliciosos platos, le esta yendo bien y gana un buen promedio, espera mas adelante poder poner un restaurante con todos los requisitos ya que tiene muchas expectativas en su negocio. En esta oportunidad solicitará S/. 1000, está muy contenta por el apoyo financiero que le brindan para que pueda seguir adelante con su trabajo, además se compromete a pagar sus cuotas de manera puntual. Con el monto solicitado comprará ingredientes e insumos tales como plátanos, yucas, arroz, hojas de Bijao entre otros para seguir con la preparación de sus deliciosos platos, además de algunos materiales y equipos para seguir con su trabajo.
texts.en:
Leidis, 36, is married to Juan and has two children; one is 11 and the other is a one-month-old baby.  They live together in their own house.  

Leidis sells food every weekend.  She goes out onto the sidewalk outside her house, writes on a chalkboard the products she is selling and starts preparing them.  She does this all by herself.  She likes her work a lot because it puts her in contact with people, she enjoys herself, she relaxes and above all she generates an income so that she can provide her children with what they need.  She also does home delivery and she always has customers ordering her delicious meals.  The venture is going well and she earns a good percentage.  Further down the line she hopes to be able to start a fully equipped restaurant as she has healthy expectations for her work.

In this credit, she is asking for S/. 1000.  She is very happy with the financial support she gets so she can progress in her work.  She also promises to pay her installments on time.  With the amount requested she will buy ingredients and supplies such as bananas, yucas, rice and 'bijao' leaves amongst others to continue preparing her delicious meals, as well as some material and equipment to continue with her work.

loans.use: to buy ingredients to prepare meals

loans.name: David

texts.en:
David is 32 years old and married with two children who are in school.

He has a transport business in Naivasha, which he has operated for five years and has applied for a third loan from Kadet ltd to enable him to service his motorbike and open a bakery. With the anticipated profit he plans to pay school fees and expand his bakery business.

He hopes to buy a plot in the near future.

loans.use: to service the motorbike and start a bakery.

loans.name: Pacita

texts.en:
Pacita is a married woman and a mother of seven children from Getafe, Bohol. She has been engaged in the sari-sari store business for a long time now. She sells condiments, seasoning, toiletries, canned goods and chips. Pacita works hard to support her husband in meeting the needs of the family, especially for the schooling of their children. 

Pacita is requesting a loan to buy canned goods, chips, toiletries, detergent and soap. She dreams of expanding her store so that it will generate more income for her family's needs.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, chips, toiletries, detergent and soap.

loans.name: Mishach

texts.en:
Mishach is a 30-year-old married man with 4 children and 2 very old parents who depend on him. He deals in cattle fattening and milk trade as his major source of income. He owns 70 cows of which a majority are for milk production. With income from his milk trade, Mishach has managed to look after his family, including his parents, by providing them with medication, paying school fees for his children, and constructing a permanent house for the family.

Mishach is applying for a loan of 3,000,000 UGX to buy more milk cows to increase his milk production. He will also use the loan to buy veterinary drugs for the cows. His major challenges are the dry season, which leads to inadequate grass to feed his animals and lack of water, as well as poor storage facilities that cause his milk to go bad and decrease his milk supply. His dream is to own a milk cooling plant in his region. Mishach is a very honest and hard working man.

loans.use: to construct a shed for his animals.

loans.name: Mourice

texts.en:
Mourice is 47 years old, married to Florence and has three children who are in school.

He has a transport business in Naivasha, which he has operated for three years and has applied for his first loan from Kadet Ltd to enable him service his car. With anticipated profit he plans to pay school fees.

He hopes to be financially stable in the near future.

loans.use: to service the car.

loans.name: Jeneffer

texts.en:
Jeneffer is a 30-year-old woman who is married to Elijah. They have been blessed with three children that are 10, 8, and 5 years old. She sells jackets for a living and has been in business for ten years. Right now her monthly income from the business is 50,000 KES. She is borrowing a loan of 60,000 KES that she wants to use to buy more jackets to sell.

Jeneffer plans to pay school fees for her children with the anticipated profit from the business. This is her 4th loan and she has successfully paid her previous loans. She hopes and dreams to buy a plot of land and build rental houses on it.

loans.use: To buy leather jackets for sale.

loans.name: Paul

texts.en:
Paul is a farmer from Olkalou who specialises in mixed farming. He has been in this business for the past 10 years.

At age 32, he is married to Jerusha who is also a farmer, and they have two children, ages 3 and 1. To enable him expand his farming activities, he has applied for his third loan of KES 25,000 from Kadet Ltd, which he will use to buy milk cans for use in storage and transportation of milk from his farm and to buy planting seeds.

His current monthly income is KES 20,000. He hopes that in the future he will be able to buy a big portion of land so he can expand his farming activities.

loans.use: To buy milk cans for storing and transporting milk to his customers and to buy planting seeds.

loans.name: Placida

texts.en:
Placida is from the town of Talibon, Bohol. She is 62 years old and married with four adult children. Placida's husband has been a tinsmith for five years. As a wife, she helps by making the necessary preparations of the materials. This has been their business that provides food for them. She is asking for a loan to buy sheets of iron and tin so they can produce more goods.

In the future, Placida hopes to save enough money so they can retire in comfort.

loans.use: to buy tin and iron sheets.

loans.name: Esther

texts.en:
Esther is from Olkalou and she is 53 years old. She is married to Michael who is a hard working carpenter, and she has three children aged 17, 13, and 11 years old.

She is a farmer who practices mixed farming. She has been in this business for the past 23 years, which gives her a monthly income of 10,000 KES. To enable her to be more productive, she has applied for her fourth loan of 25,000 KES from KADET Ltd. that she will use to buy young chicks to engage in poultry farming.

She intends to use the anticipated income from her expanded business to educate her children. She hopes and dreams that in the future she will be the most successful farmer in her area.

loans.use: To boost her farming activities by engaging in poultry rearing

loans.name: Flamme Du Succes Group

texts.fr: FLAMME DU SUCCES est un groupe composé de trois personnes qui résident dans le même quartier. La représentante du groupe, nommée Ayaba Philomène (celle qui a la main levée sur la photo) n’a pas fréquenté l’école. Ayaba Philomène est mariée à Marisse. Le couple a quatre enfants, tous scolarisés et à leur charge. Les charges du ménage sont supportées par Ayaba Philomène et son mari. C'est pour cette raison que Ayaba Philomène vend des condiments depuis dix ans à son domicile. De façon secondaire, Ayaba Philomène vend aussi divers articles( savon, huile, sucre). Ayaba Philomène s'approvisionne dans un marché du Bénin. Dans le but de renforcer son activité, Ayaba Philomène s’associe aux autres membres du groupe FLAMME DU SUCCES pour solliciter un premier crédit auprès de ALIDé.
texts.en: Flamme Du Succes is a group consisting of three people who live in the same neighborhood. The leader of the group, named Ayaba Philomène (the one who has her hand raised in the photo), did not go to school. Ayaba Philomène is married to Marisse. The couple has four children, all in school and under their care. The household responsibilities are taken care of by Ayaba Philomène and her husband. It's for this reason that Ayaba Philomène has been selling condiments from her home for ten years. On the side, Ayaba Philomène also sells a variety of items (soap, oil, sugar). Ayaba Philomène gets her supplies in a market in Bénin. With the goal of strengthening her business, Ayaba Philomène joins the other members of the group Flamme Du Succes to request a first loan from ALIDé.

loans.use: to buy condiments and a variety of other items.

loans.name: Simon

texts.en:
Simon is 32 years old and married to Alice. The couple has one child, who is age 2.

Simon has a retail shop in Naivasha, which he has operated for one and a half years. He has applied for his first loan from Kadet Ltd to enable him to buy stock of maize flour, soap, fruits and other products. With the anticipated profits, he plans to add more stock.

Simon hopes to expand his business to increase his income in the near future.

loans.use: To buy stock of maize flour, soap, fruits and other products.

loans.name: Nicky

texts.es: Nicky, de 35 años de edad, está casado con Malti y tiene 2 hijos de 14 y 08 años de edad en su casa propia. Nicky se dedica al cultivo de yucas y plátanos  para la venta en los mercados de la localidad y para su consumo personal,  además de tener sembríos de palma aceitera contando para eso con un terreno de 20 hectáreas  que lo adquirió hace 10 años, tiempo que viene ejerciendo este oficio y  contando con la ayuda de su esposo en las cosechas con  quien  comparte las ganancias. Le gusta su negocio pues lo conoce muy bien ya que lleva muchos años dedicándose a ese oficio, y dicha experiencia la está pasando a sus hijos, además de las ganancias que le deja con la cual a sabido mantener a su familia y procura que no les falte lo necesario. Este es su sexto crédito con Kiva por ello solicita de su colaboración para que pueda concretar sus planes. Con el monto solicitado de 2000 nuevos soles comprará abono orgánico.
texts.en: Nicky is 35 years old. He is married to Malti and has 2 children, aged 14 and 8. They live in their own home. Nicky grows yucca and plantains to sell in the area markets and for personal consumption. He also has oil palms and has a plot of 20 hectares that he acquired 10 years ago. He has been working in this trade for that long and has his wife's help with the harvests, and they share the earnings. He likes his business because he knows it very well, since he has been doing it for many years. He is passing that experience in to his children. With what he earns he has been able to support his family and make it so they have everything they need. This is his sixth loan with Kiva and he is asking for your cooperation to finalize his plans. With the amount of 2000 nuevos soles that he has asked for, he will buy organic fertilizer.

loans.use: to buy organic fertilizer.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a motor cycle

loans.name: Marema

texts.fr:
La dame Marema, âgée de 38 ans est une femme très active qui évolue dans le domaine du commerce. Il a acquis une expérience de plus de 5 ans en partant presque de rien. Elle est mariée et mère de famille. Elle vient solliciter un crédit afin d’acheter de l’huile de palme au fin de le revendre.
Marema participe aux dépenses de son foyer et prend en charge, l’éducation de ces enfants. Elle veut améliorer son commerce et le diversifier en vendant des denrées alimentaires dans un grand magasin. Elle n’a pas encore les moyens de le faire mais espère pouvoir réaliser ce rêve  grâce  a l’appui d’une Institution financière comme l’IMCEC avec laquelle elle a déjà commencée a travailler.
texts.en: The woman Marema, 38 years old, is a very active woman who is progressing in business. She has acquired more than 5 years experience starting from almost nothing. She is married and a mother. She is requesting a loan in order to buy palm oil to resell. Marema contributes to the expenses of her home and takes care of the education of her children. She wants to improve her business and diversify by selling foodstuffs in a department store. She doesn't yet have the means to do so but hopes to be able to realize this dream thanks to the support of a financial institution like the UIMCEC with which she has already started to work.

loans.use: to buy palm oil to resell.

loans.name: Germaine

texts.fr: Germaine est une ancienne bénéficiaire de ALIDé qui est mariée avec des enfants. Germaine vit ensemble avec ses enfants et son mari. Les diverses charges de la famille sont assurées par le coupe. Germaine vend des condiments, des vivres et de l'huile dans une ville du Bénin. C'est la cinquième fois que Germaine sollicite l’appui financier de ALIDé, dans le but de mieux répondre aux exigences de ses clients. Ce nouveau prêt va permettre à Germaine de rehausser le niveau de son activité en vue de mieux satisfaire sa clientèle. Les prêts antérieurs ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en: Germaine is a previous beneficiary of ALIDé who is married with children. Germaine lives together with her children and her husband. The various family responsibilities are taken care of by the couple. Germaine sells condiments, foodstuffs and oil in a town of Bénin. This is the fifth time that Germaine is requesting financial support from ALIDé, with the goal of better responding to the demands of her customers. This new loan will allow Germaine to increase the level of her business in order to better satisfy her clientele. The previous loans were well repaid.

loans.use: to buy condiments, bags of foodstuffs and cans of oil.

loans.name: Paul

texts.en:
Paul is 25 years old from Olkalou. He is married to Eunice who assists him with farm work. He has one child aged 2 years old. Paul is a farmer, an occupation he has been in for the last five years. He has applied for his third loan of 15,000 KES from Kadet Ltd. that he will use to buy farm inputs like fertilizers and seeds to plant.

His monthly income right now is 20,000 KES. He intends to use the anticipated profits from his expanded business to further expand his farming activities so as to ensure that his child does not lack money to enroll in school when he is of age. Paul hopes and dreams of buying a piece of land and constructing a house for his family in the future.

loans.use: To buy farm inputs like fertilizers and seeds for planting

loans.name: Sara Esmeralde

texts.es:
Sara de 40 años de edad, por las condiciones en que vivían de pobreza, solo pudo estudiar hasta tercer grado. Esta casada y tiene 3 hijos y todos estudian.
Su esposo es carpintero y ella tiene 7 años de trabajar criando pollos de engorde y gallina ponedora, utilizo los desperdicios de madera que deja su esposo para construir una galera y comederos para los animales. Diariamente alimenta a los animales, limpia el agua, recolecta huevos y salea a venderlos.

El préstamo sera invertido en la compra de 200 gallinas ponedoras, estas ya están iniciando su postura y las galeras que la recibirán ya esta construida.

Al incrementar el número de gallinas, podrá satisfacer la demanda de huevos en  el vecindario  y mercado local.


Sus planes a futuro, que con los ingresos de la producción, sus hijos puedan terminar la universidad.
texts.en:
Sara is 40 years old. Due to the poverty she lived in, she was only able to go to school through the third grade. She is married and has 3 children. All of them go to school. 

Her husband is a carpenter and she has worked for 7 years raising chickens to fatten up as well as laying hens. She used leftover wood from her husband to build a chicken coop and feeding troughs for her animals. Every day she feeds the animals, gives them clean water, collects their eggs and goes out to sell them.

The loan will be invested in buying 200 laying hens. These will start laying and the coops will already be built. Once she increases the number of hens, she will be able to fill the demand for eggs in the neighborhood and in the local market. 


Her plans for the future are to send her children to college with the income from the production.

loans.use: to buy 200 laying hens.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy piglets and feed.

loans.name: Alice

texts.en:
This is Alice from Liberia; she lives in the Caldwell area of Montserrado County. This area is becoming one of the more populated communities in Montserrado due to some factors such as good roads, quietness and lower price of house rents. 

Alice is 45 years old. She is married and has five children between 11 and 30 years old; only one lives at home and is going to school. Her husband is a teacher. 

She runs a table business where she sells used clothes. She is asking for a loan to buy enough used clothes to increase her sales. She complains the fluctuation of prices is the major problem she faces now; she started this business with a little money from her husband. She enjoys her business because she makes her own money, and she so proud of her business because it makes her independent. 

Her plan is to one day own a house, and see her child attending university in the near future. She appreciates the supporters of BRAC Liberia.

loans.use: to buy enough used clothes to increase her sales.

loans.name: Mamie

texts.en:
Mamie is from Liberia; she lives in the Caldwell area of Montserrado County. This area is becoming one of the more populated communities in Montserrado due to some changes such as good roads, quietness, and lower price of house rents. 

Mamie is 28 years old, single and has two children. Her children’s ages are two and five. Only one goes to school, but they both live at home. She has been running a table business where she sells frozen chicken for six years now. 

She is requesting a loan to buy more frozen chicken to increase her sales. She started this business with a little money from her mother. She enjoys her business because she makes profit. Her plans are to open a saving account, and help her to sustain her home. 

She appreciates the supporters of BRAC Liberia.

loans.use: to buy more frozen chicken to increase her sales.

loans.name: Ghislaine

texts.fr: Ghislaine est une ancienne cliente de ALIDé. Ghislaine sollicite une cinquième fois l’appui financier de ALIDé, toujours dans le but d'accroître le niveau de son activité et de mieux répondre aux besoins de sa famille. Ghislaine vend des condiments, des vivres et des bidons d'huile dans une région du Bénin. Ghislaine s'approvisionne dans un marché du Bénin. Les crédits antérieurs ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en: Ghislaine is a former client of ALIDé. Ghislaine is requesting financial support from ALIDé for the fifth time, always with the goal of growing the level of her business and better responding to the needs of her family. Ghislaine sells condiments, foodstuffs and cans of oil in a region of Bénin. Ghislaine gets her supplies in a market in Bénin. The previous loans were well repaid.

loans.use: to buy condiments, bags of foodstuffs and cans of oil.

loans.name: María Del Carmen

texts.es:
María de 56 años de edad, es divorciada, tiene 4 hijos no finalizo sus estudios, llego hasta segundo grado, por lo que se le dificulto encontrar un trabajo formal.

María se dedica a la venta de frutas y verduras en el mercado, tiene 20 años de experiencia en este negocio, pero debido a la edad, la hermana y un hijo se están haciendo cargo del negocio y María se dedica a criar gallinas criollas en su casa para luego poder venderlas. Todo lo que María vende en el local de el mercado lo compra a mayoristas que la dan el mejor precio.

El préstamo será utilizado para comprar frutas y verduras,  aumentar el inventario de su negocio y dar a sus clientes un mejor servicio, teniendo una gran variedad de productos tendrá satisfechos a sus clientes por lo tanto aumentara los ingresos económicos para la familia.

María vive en una casa construida con adobe, ella sueña tener algún día una casa de ladrillo para vivir con mayor comodidad
texts.en:
María is 56 years old. She is divorced and has 4 children. She didn't finish her schooling, so it was difficult for her to find a regular job. 

María sells fruit and vegetables in the market. She has 20 years experience in this business, but due to her age, her sister and her son are taking care of the business. María raises chickens at her home to later sell. María sells everything in the market to wholesalers who give her the best price.

The loan will be used to buy fruits and vegetables, to increase her business inventory and give her customers a better service. With a wide variety of products, she will keep her customers satisfied and thus increase the earnings for her family.

María lives in a house built from adobe. She dreams of someday having a house built of brick to live more comfortably.

loans.use: to buy fruit and vegetables for the business.

loans.name: Julio Javier

texts.es: Julio tiene 24 años de edad, estudia la carrera de Lic. en derecho, labora como asistente en un despacho jurídico, tiene muchos deseos de superación personal, con esfuerzos está en la etapa final de su carrera. Solicita este crédito para el pago del curso de titulación de su carrera y un postgrado, esto le permitirá ejercer mejor su trabajo y con el tiempo aspirar a un mejor puesto laboral que le permita desarrollarse y prosperar junto a su familia.
texts.en:
Julio is 24 years old and studies law. He works as an assistant in a legal office. He has a lot of self-improvement plans and is now finishing his studies thanks to his hard work.

Julio is requesting a loan to pay for the formalization of his degree and for a post-graduate course. This will help him to perform better in his job and with time aspire to a higher position that gives him the opportunity to develop and prosper together with his family.

loans.use: to pay for the formalization of his degree and for a post-graduate course.

loans.name: Saturnina

texts.en:
Saturnina is 48 years old and is from Talibon, Bohol. She is married with six children aged between 18 and 26. Saturnina and her husband have been engaged in a fishing business for 30 years now. This is her family's main livelihood and means to support their family. 

She is asking for a loan to buy plywood and gasoline for the boat as well as pay for school fees. This will be helpful and will mean that they can catch more than before and continue fishing. 

The income that they will generate from fishing will be used to buy healthy meals for her family and pay for school fees.

loans.use: to buy plywood and gasoline and pay school fees.

loans.name: Sadia Simon

texts.en:
Sadia is 50 years of age. She is married with six children; two of them go to school. She resides in Yei Town, South Sudan where she does her business. She heard about Finance Sudan Limited through marketing by the Loan Officers.

Sadia is a businesswoman who owns a retail shop that sells flour. She has been in this business for 10 years now. She is borrowing a loan worth 4,000 South Sudanese Pounds so as to expand her business and buy more stock. 

She will repay the loan with the profits from the business. The loan will also help her pay school fees and purchase medication for her family.

loans.use: To buy flour to resell.

loans.name: Merla

texts.en:
Merla lives in Getafe, Bohol together with her family. She has five children aged 14 to 27. She has been engaged in a fishing business for more than seven years now with her husband. This is their main livelihood. 

Merla is requesting a loan to buy new fishing nets to replace the old ones. With this they will be able to improve their fishing business as well as their income. In the future, Merla hopes to have a better income than what she is earning now for the sake of her children’s education.

loans.use: to buy fishing nets.

loans.name: Ogougba Augustine

texts.fr: La nommée Ogougba Augustine est une ancienne cliente de ALIDé. Ogougba Augustine est mariée et a des enfants. Ogougba Augustine vit ensemble avec ses enfants et assure avec son mari leurs différentes charges. Ogougba Augustine affirme que grâce aux prêts antérieurs, elle a pu équiper sa boutique, ce qui lui a permis de mieux répondre aux besoins de ses clients. Ogougba Augustine vend des sacs de charbon de bois et des tissus. Ogougba Augustine sollicite une cinquième fois l’appui financier de ALIDé. Ce nouveau prêt va permettre à Ogougba Augustine de rehausser le niveau de son activité et d'accroître son revenu. Les prêts antérieurs ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en: The person named Ogougba Augustine is a former client of ALIDé. Ogougba Augustine is married and has children. Ogougba Augustine lives together with her children and takes care of the different responsibilities with her husband. Ogougba Augustine affirms that thanks to the previous loans, she was able to equip her shop, which allowed her to better respond to the needs of her customers. Ogougba Augustine sells bags of charcoal and fabric. Ogougba Augustine is requesting financial support from ALIDé for the fifth time.
